text: The Imperial Trans-Antarctic expedition of 1914â€“1917 is seen as the last major expedition of the Heroic Age of Antarctic Exploration. It was led by Sir Ernest Shackleton. The expedition was an attempt to make the first land crossing of the Antarctic continent. Shackleton's expedition failed when his ship, Endurance sank. ==References== Category:1914 Category:1915 Category:1916 Category:1917 Category:History of Antarctica
title: Imperial Trans-Antarctic Expedition
